document.full_text: at least 527 people were executed around the world last year, down from 714 in 2009, although china is believed to have put to death thousands more, human rights group amnesty international said on monday.
document.title: executions down in 2010, rights groups says
lines_and_colors: at least 527 people were executed around the world last year, down from 714 in 2009, although china is believed to have put to death thousands more, human rights group amnesty international said on monday.
